modName: Severin Manor - Adoption Friendly - Redecorated - DELETED
summary: Severin Manor as a cluttered cozy house for a family with two kids. Navmeshed, with sandbox idles, storage, crafting stations, laundry, bathroom, sweetrolls and more.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][size=2]This mod based on [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42658/]Severin Manor - Adoption Friendly[/url].


[b]Compatibility and requirements[/b]:

Requires all DLCs and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url]. In order to move the family in requires [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249]Hearthfire multiple adoptions[/url] (not a hard requirement).[/size][/font]

[font=Verdana][color=red][size=6][b][u]This mod needs to be installed on a new game[/u][/b][/size][/color]


[size=2]The mod edits Served Cold quest (DLC2RR02), specifically it's script fragment on the last stage.

In order to avoid dirty edits and conflicts it doesn't edit the existing Severin Manor cell (DLC2RRSeverinHouse). The alternative, duplicated cell was made instead (DLC2RRSeverinHouseDUPLICATE001). When the Served Cold quest (DLC2RR02) is completed, the old door leading to the original cell is replaced with the new one, leading to the adoption friendly house.[/size]

[size=2]This way all the references in the old house are safe. Compatibility should be fine: mods altering DLC2RRSeverinHouse cell can still do that, it doesn't matter, you won't be living there (unless they try to re-enable the exterior door or something, but that's unlikely). However, mods editing the same script/quest might be a problem.[/size]

[size=2]If there are mods that directly place you in the DLC2RRSeverinHouse, they can still do that, and you can leave the cell as usual through the door. Entering would only be possible with the console command coc DLC2RRSeverinHouse, or, alternatively, do these quests before completing Served Cold and getting the house. I am not aware if there are mods that would care for this cell, so do share your experience.[/size]

[size=2]Surrounding area in Raven Rock is mostly untouched (small ash yam farm added near the house, plus various markers for sandboxing), so city mods should probably be fine (again, if they don't touch the door or move the house).[/size]

[size=2]Compatible (and meant to use) with [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/]Hearthfire multiple adoptions[/url][size=2].[/size]
[size=2]In order to move in the house cast a 'Bless Home' spell and ask spouse/child to move in your new house, all as usual. Don't forget to keep a save before asking them to move in case something goes sideways and they don't arrive (usually doesn't happen, but it's a known vanilla issue).[/size][/font]

[size=2][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/88567/88567-1514171472-452394439.jpeg[/img][/size]

[font=Verdana][size=2]There are 2 children's rooms for two kids (one of them has a small garden and enchanting table, another – a swing and bunch of other static toys, as well as place for many more if you use mods for craftable toys, such as [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85282]Toymania[/url], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47315]Skyrim Toy Story[/url], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84524]Craftable Gifts for Children[/url], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85800]Toys of Skyrim[/url] etc.), kitchen with laundry zone, bathroom, storage room and master bedroom. Check all the pages of the '[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88567?tab=images]Images[/url]' section to see.[/size][/font]

[size=2]﻿[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/88567/88567-1514173912-1762025571.jpeg[/img][/size]

[font=Verdana][size=2]Following crafting stations are present: alchemy station, cooking pot, oven, tanning rack, grindstone, forge, workbench, enchanting table. There are mannequins, bookshelves, weapon displays.
[/size][/font]
[size=2][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/88567/88567-1514171422-1684148450.jpeg[/img][/size]

[font=Verdana][size=2] You can use mods like [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51473/]iNeed[/url], [/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8732]Cannabis Skyrim[/url] or [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30200]Pipe Smoking[/url], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58296]Simple Actions[/url], etc. to relax on these pillows.[/size][/font]

[size=2][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/88567/88567-1514177859-1202400921.jpeg[/img][/size]
[font=Verdana][size=2]
Bathroom has automatic undressing for NPCs (they redress on the way out) and a bucket to mysteriously sit on.[/size][/font]

[size=2][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/88567/88567-1514171535-1168011916.jpeg[/img][/size]
[font=Verdana]
[b]Credits:
[/b]
[size=2]First of all huge thanks to Luka Kaštelan for the original[/size]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42658][size=2]Severin Manor - Adoption Friendly[/size][/url]

[size=2]
Special thanks to Ninety9rising for [url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66699]CLEAN Level 225 ultimate savegame 99 percent done[/url] – testing is a bitch.[/size][/font]

[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/thumbnails/65163-1-1430165136.png[/img]﻿[/center]
[font=Verdana][size=2][b]Permissions[/b] are usual: do not reupload it anywhere, do not try to profit from it. If you want to do something else with the mod, let me know at some point.

And if you want to live in Solitude, check out [url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88459]Deithwen - Family Edition[/url] and [/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88918]Proudspire Manor Remodel - Bourgeois Apartment[/url].[/size][/font]
author: Luka Kastelan boringvlln
